/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. On the left side of the street, trees add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being immersed in the cityscape.
